title: Triceratops
description: Massive (12’ to the shoulder, almost 40’ long), aggressive, herbivorous dinosaurs with a protective crest behind the head, and three long horns. Dwell in Lost World grasslands.
extras: Aggressive: Normally attack on sight.	Charge: In first round of combat, when not in melee. Requires a clear run of at least 20 yards. Horns inflict double damage.	Trample: 3-in-4 chance of trampling each round. +4 to-hit human-sized or smaller creatures.
